post:
**[Limitless Hosting](https://limitlesshost.net)** provides affordable, and quality shared/reseller hosting. It was found in 2015 and used to provide other digital services such as game server hosting.

**Website**: https://limitlesshost.net

**Web Hosting & Reseller Hosting starting from $0.50/month!**

**Web Hosting Offers:**
**XS Shared Hosting**
- 1 GB SSD
- 50 GB Bandwidth
- 1 Addon Domain
- 5 MySQL Database
Price: **$6/year**
**Order USA Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/usahosting-da/?group_id=39&pricing_id=303
**Order EU Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/de-sharedhosting/?group_id=33&pricing_id=246

**Small Shared Hosting**
- 5 GB SSD
- 100 GB Bandwidth
- 2 Addon Domain
- 7 MySQL Database
Price: **$16.80/year**
**Order USA Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/usahosting-da/?group_id=39&pricing_id=304
**Order EU Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/de-sharedhosting/?group_id=33&pricing_id=247

**Medium Shared Hosting**
- 10 GB SSD
- 150 GB Bandwidth
- 4 Addon Domain
- 8 MySQL Database
Price: **$2.50/month**
**Order USA Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/usahosting-da/?group_id=39&pricing_id=309
**Order EU Hosting**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/de-sharedhosting/?group_id=33&pricing_id=252

**Reseller Hosting Offers:**
**Small Reseller Hosting**
- 20 GB SSD
- 200 GB Bandwidth
- 30 DirectAdmin Accounts
**Price: $4/month**
**Order USA Reseller**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/usa-resellerhosting/?group_id=41&pricing_id=333
**Order EU Reseller**: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/eu-resellerhosting/?group_id=38&pricing_id=291

**Other Reseller Hosting Packages**: https://limitlesshost.net/reseller-hosting/

**Features:**
- DirectAdmin Control Panel
- Free Unlimited SSL
- Limitless Email Accounts
- Limitless FTP Accounts
- CloudLinux
- SSD, NVME SSD for USA only
- Weekly Remote Backups
- One-Click Web Installer (Softaculous)
- EU: Germany, USA: Dallas

**Payment Methods:**
- PayPal
- Credit/Debit Card
- Bitcoin
- PerfectMoney
- Skrill

**Contact Us:**
Email: sales@limitlesshost.net
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/limitlesshosting
